snippet.title: Fruit Mountain | Official Promotion Video
snippet.description:
Fruit Mountain, a puzzle game where you stack fruits, is now on sale on Steam / Nintendo Switch / PS5 / PS4!

Website: https://bexide.co.jp/en/fruit
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2753620/_/
Twitter(X) JP: https://twitter.com/bexide 
Twitter(X) EN: https://twitter.com/BeXideEn

#FruitMountain
